title: Rads Error
body:
I have been struggling to launch lol, each time i try i get a pop up saying rads error- couldn't connect to http, your fire wall may be blocking this program. i have disabled my fire wall and launch again with no success, i then trouble shot youtube, checked my system had the right code, changed my net work DNS to 8888-8844.
still nothing

replies.body: i cant even click on lol support with out an error poping up
What error do you receive when attempting to navigate to the support site?
